title: Mosyle Opens Public Beta of its OneK12 Six-in-One IT Solution for Schools Using Apple Devices
description: Apple-specific MDM and security provider Mosyle has made available to all K–12 schools a “long trial” of its new Apple Unified Platform device management and security solution for educational institutions called OneK12, which integrates device management, content filtering, endpoint security, single sign-on, application management, and classroom management.
